text: Mr. Healey denounced the Government for using double standards. Ministers had rebuked the unaligned nations for not condemning the new Russian tests, but they themselves had no condemnation for events in Angola or Algeria. It was not for the Government, said Mr. Healey, to take up moral attitudes, especially when the temple of their religion is the bingo-parlour.
handwritten_text: Mr. Healey denounced the Government for using double standards. Ministers had rebuked the unaligned nations for not condemning the new Russian tests, but they themselves had no condemnation for events in Angola or Algeria. It was not for the Government, said Mr. Healey, to take up moral attitudes, especially when the temple of their religion is the bingo-parlour.
